name: JOLLY's All New Math Game
description:
Welcome to JOLLY's All New Math game Where things come to be.

Inspired by Baldi's Brand New Game by GrandGames

Credits to SeenWonderAlex for 5th Prize

Credits to NotFurnace for The Gotta Paint Script

Cast

JOLLY The Bee- Baldi

Tweetie The Bird- Playtime

George the tiger- Principal of the thing

Maxie the cat- It's a bully

Antonette- Arts and Crafters

Animatronic Broom- Gotta Sweep

Animatronic Paint Brush- Gotta Paint

1st Prize- Himself

5th Prize- Herself

Wendy- Beans (NOTE: Wengo got destroyed)

Crimson- Ms Pomp

Dorian- filename2

Prototype Fantasy JOLLY head- PlaceFace

Tank Goodtime- TankBaldi

Credits to SadColoredMods for the better version of PorkyPowers 1.4.3 open source decompile
